Summary Note:
Janssen Visser Van den Berg and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Amsterdam. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Having worked for over 39 years, Janssen Visser Van den Berg brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Janssen Visser Van den Berg is currently divorced. He has 2 kids called Luna and Stam.
Education Background:
Janssen obtained his secondary school diploma from Calvijn College Goes in 1980.
Janssen received his degree from Tio University of Applied Sciences in 1984.
Occupation History:
Janssen Visser Van den Berg is a 63 year old retired Senior Trader from Netherlands.
Janssen Visser Van den Berg began his professional journey as a Junior Trader at Vitol Group in 1986, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Senior Trader at Gunvor Group Ltd. in 1992, further expanding his skill set.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 680000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He owns townhouse in Amsterdam, where he resides. It is worth 1480000 EUR.

He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In summary, Janssen has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
